name: .ZSM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A ZSM file is a sound archive used by various video games, such as X-Men Legends and X-Men Legends II: Rise of the Apocalypse. It contains compressed .WAV sound files that are referenced during gameplay. ZSM files are not meant to be opened manually by a user.

content: ZSM files are used by a variety of games developed by Raven Software. The games include the X-Men Legends and Marvel: Ultimate Alliance series.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
